name: World Legacy Communion
desc: When your opponent activates a monster effect while you control a "Krawler" monster: The activated effect becomes "Return 1 face-up monster your opponent controls to the hand". You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Link Monster on the field; Special Summon 1 "Krawler" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY in face-down Defense Position to your zone the targeted monster points to. You can only use 1 "World Legacy Communion" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
